heading: HR00847
0:
RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH OF THE HOUSE OF
REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION,
INTO THE HIRING AND MANAGEMENT OF EMPLOYEES, THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS AND THE CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES OF THE TALAVERA GENERAL HOSPITAL BASED ON AN ANONYMOUS COMPLAINT AGAINST THE MANAGEMENT OF THE SAID HOSPITAL AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00847
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE HIRING AND MANAGEMENT OF EMPLOYEES, THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS AND THE CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES OF THE TALAVERA GENERAL HOSPITAL BASED ON AN ANONYMOUS COMPLAINT AGAINST THE MANAGEMENT OF THE SAID HOSPITAL AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES
